trans-unit.source: Modifies a database query by using a value from specified filter control.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的篩選器控制項中的值來修改資料庫查詢。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression> class enables you to modify a database query using the values that are assigned in a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression>類別可讓您修改資料庫查詢使用中被指派的值<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This control delegates the task of building of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> query to a specialized control such as <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> control or <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter> control.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項將委派的建置工作<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>查詢至特定控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>控制項或<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The filter controls in turn delegate the building of the query to the filter template that they reference.
trans-unit.target: 篩選控制項依次委派之查詢所參考的篩選器範本的建置。

trans-unit.source: The query is then executed by the data source control that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control.
trans-unit.target: 然後會執行查詢所參考的資料來源控制項來<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression> class in a page, you follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression>類別在頁面中，請遵循下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>控制項加入網頁。

trans-unit.source: Set the `TargetControlID` property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control to reference the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 設定`TargetControlID`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>控制項參考資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression> object as a child of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression>物件做為子系<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Set the `ControlID` property of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression> object to reference the filter control.
trans-unit.target: 設定`ControlID`屬性<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression>物件參考篩選控制項。

trans-unit.source: In the previous steps it is assumed that the related filter controls, data-bound controls, and data source control are defined in the page.
trans-unit.target: 在先前步驟中假設是相關的篩選器控制項、 資料繫結控制項和資料來源控制項頁面中定義。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression> control to select a filter template in a page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression>控制項在頁面中選取篩選範本。

trans-unit.source: The filter template is selected by the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter> control that is identified by <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression> control through its `ControID` property.
trans-unit.target: 選取的篩選器範本<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter>所識別的控制項<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression>透過控制其`ControID`屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the filter control identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定篩選控制項識別項。

trans-unit.source: The filter control identifier.
trans-unit.target: 篩選控制項識別項。

trans-unit.source: This control identifier is used by the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression> class to select the filter control to which it delegates the task of building of the query, which is in turn executed by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項識別項由<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression>類別，以選取的篩選器可讓您控制它委派查詢，依序執行的資料來源控制項的建置工作。

trans-unit.source: The filter control delegates the task of building of the query to the filter template it references.
trans-unit.target: 篩選控制項委派給工作的建置之查詢的篩選器範本的參考。

trans-unit.source: The query is then executed by the data source control that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control.
trans-unit.target: 然後會執行查詢所參考的資料來源控制項來<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression> class to select a filter control in a page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression>頁面中選取篩選器控制項的類別。

trans-unit.source: The data source query to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的資料來源查詢。

trans-unit.source: Gets the modified query using the current filter value.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用目前的篩選值所修改的查詢。

trans-unit.source: The data source query that is modified by using the current value that is contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源查詢，此查詢已使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression" /> 執行個體中所包含的目前值完成修改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression.GetQueryable%2A> method delegates the task of building of the query to the filter template referenced by the filter control that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression.ControlID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression.GetQueryable%2A>方法會委派之查詢所指定的篩選器控制項所參考的篩選器範本的建置工作<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression.ControlID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The control that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression" /> instance, such as the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression" /> 執行個體的控制項，例如 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The target data source for the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilterExpression" /> 執行個體的目標資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the expression with data source information.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料來源資訊初始化運算式。
